Report.description: Business Rule: These staff regularly interact with diverse communities and we need to regularly update the "Social and Environmental Justice" flag. Action Item: Send the list to EJ Council members add the flag if appropriate.

filter.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
